FILE: cm630781v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAN - MALDIVE ISLANDS
RIVALRY: RIV1205
DISPUTE(S): MID2790 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190220
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190220

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2790

TERRMID: MID2790 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2790 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2790 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2790 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2790 from Gibler 2018, in 1987 Iran attacked a Maldives tanker during the Iran-Iraq War. Iran routinely attacked ships trading with Iraq as a means of harming Iraq's economy. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2790 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2790 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2790 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2790 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2790 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2790 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2790 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2790 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2790 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2790 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2790 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2790 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
